original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 862: Have Your CAKE and Eat It Too
original_content:
This week Jonathan chats with Toke Hoiland-Jorgensen about CAKE_MQ, the newest Kernel innovation to combat Bufferbloat! What was the realization that made CAKE parallelization? When can we expect it in the wild? And whats new in the rest of the kernel world? Watch to find out!


Blog: https://blog.tohojo.dk
Github: https://github.com/tohojo
Mastodon: @toke@social.kernel.org


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or have the guest contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
